name: HENTAI REDEMPTION
description:
HENTAI REDEMPTION is an adventurous shooting game in the Wild West theme. You are playing for Wild West Girl: brave lonely H.E.N.T.A.I. fighter who is ready to take on all of the bad dudes out there. Your target is to kill as many enemies as you have the balls to..Features: authentic Wild West atmosphere
variety of weapons to choose from
you have your own horse to ride on
realistic Wild West fighting mechanics
